verses.verse: A Song <WH7892> of degrees <WH4609>. Many a time <WH7227> have they afflicted <WH6887> <WH8804> me from my youth <WH5271>, may Yisra'EL <WH3478> now say <WH559> <WH8799>:
Many a time <WH7227> have they afflicted <WH6887> <WH8804> me from my youth <WH5271>: yet they have not prevailed <WH3201> <WH8804> against me.
The plowers <WH2790> <WH8802> plowed <WH2790> <WH8804> upon my back <WH1354>: they made long <WH748> <WH8689> their furrows <WH4618> <WH8675> <WH4618>.
The YY <WH3068> is righteous <WH6662>: he hath cut asunder <WH7112> <WH8765> the cords <WH5688> of the wicked <WH7563>.
Let them all be confounded <WH954> <WH8799> and turned <WH5472> <WH8735> back <WH268> that hate <WH8130> <WH8802> TZiyon <WH6726>.
Let them be as the grass <WH2682> upon the housetops <WH1406>, which withereth <WH3001> <WH8804> afore <WH6927> it groweth up <WH8025> <WH8804>:
Wherewith the mower <WH7114> <WH8802> filleth <WH4390> <WH8765> not his hand <WH3709>; nor he that bindeth sheaves <WH6014> <WH8764> his bosom <WH2683>.
Neither do they which go by <WH5674> <WH8802> say <WH559> <WH8804>, The b'rakhah <WH1293> of the YY <WH3068> be upon you: we bless <WH1288> <WH8765> you in the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068>.
